post.body: I am lame, do not have AIM. Axed that shit back in the 90's.
oy. I'll definitely see it, because OMG ZELDA but geez that trailer makes it look shitty
Tear down that BITCH of a barren wall and put a window where one ought to be!
Could you please make it in iambic pentameter?
I got your gingerbread bear, I loled. Gay bears are all the rage nowadays. =)
Well you've got that nice little blue briefcase now. =)
It's "Call In Gay" to work day.
Yes beard
It would severely cripple my work flow. We often have to compare two different questionnaires and projects from month-to-month.
LJ user radiomatthew said he has news too and he works for some radio station, so it's gotta be legit.
WAT is the Prop 8 news gurl?! I am refreshing nooz sites to no avail.
ONSD
wishes he could subscribe to podcasts from a different computer than the one where iTunes is installed. Like say, from a work computer.
is not very happy about having to pay $215.96 just for blood lab work, after insurance.
is kind of proud of himself for having actually PAID for software.
I've now eaten three fortune cookies. That must make me very fortunate.
Come on, ppl. Is the "Jizz in my pants" video really THAT funny?
I've been working with a dual monitor setup at work, but because we can't afford to get monitors for my colleagues, I have to give mine up.
I need a non o_O image for my icon here.
I'm pondering new ways to be abandoned and neglected by Rice. *sniffle*
